results.title: [Prediabetes - 2009].
results.text_hl: An @<m>DISEASE_Severe_combined_immunodeficiency_due_to_adenosine_deaminase_deficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C531816 @@@ADA@@@ panel suggests that individuals with @DISEASE_Prediabetic_State @DISEASE_MESH:D011236 @@@prediabetes@@@ should be enrolled in a program of intensive lifestyle intervention, with a specific group of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ at risk to be considered for therapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.
